stimulusHtml: In the Scenes from the Apocalypse from a Bible moralisée, the use of rich coloration, a segmented composition, and instructional content were most likely influenced by

features.html:

choicesHtml: Merovingian cloisonné metalwork, which features the interplay of positive and negative space
medieval embroideries depicting stories of historical event through the combination of text and image
stained-glass presentations of religious narratives used in medieval church windows
Byzantine mosaics using round, cut stones called tesserae to present images of the royal court
